The AWS CloudFormation template for this Serverless application

/home/xavi-13/Documentos/Proyects/Evalua.serviceRawFile:
service: encuesta-backend
frameworkVersion: '4'

build:
  esbuild: false

provider:
  name: aws
  runtime: nodejs18.x
  region: us-east-1
  environment:
    DATABASE_URL: "mysql://admin:j3V9%3D7%23Hs@encuestas-db.chqsiia463y5.us-east-2.rds.amazonaws.com:3306/encuestas_db?sslaccept=accept_invalid_certs"

package:
  patterns:
    - '!node_modules/**'
    - 'node_modules/.prisma/**'
    - 'node_modules/@prisma/client/**'
    - 'prisma/schema.prisma'       

functions:
  api:
    handler: src/lambda.handler
    events:
      - http:
          path: /
          method: ANY
          cors: true
      - http:
          path: /{proxy+}
          method: ANY
          cors: true

plugins:
  - serverless-esbuild
  - serverless-offline

custom:
  esbuild:
    bundle: true
    minify: false
    sourcemap: true
    exclude: ['aws-sdk']
    target: 'node18'
    platform: 'node'
    concurrency: 10
    external:
      - '@prisma/client'
      - '.prisma'
